title: Bissell ProHeat 2X CleanShot Carpet Cleaning System
transcripts:
Bissell® ProHeat 2X® CleanShot® Carpet Cleaning System

Deep clean your carpet with this revolutionary system, which loosens and removes most harmful dirt and ground-in grit. The patented Bissell ProHeat CleanShot Carpet Cleaning Systembuilt-in heater heats the water and the cleaning solution, which travel through the heater just before being sprayed onto your carpet. Continuous heated cleaning makes all the difference, ensuring maximum cleaning effectiveness. Microban® protection is built-in to key components of the ProHeat 2X to fight the growth of odor causing bacteria, mold and mildew. System can be used on carpet, upholstery, stairs, autos, and bare floors with the use of the various attachments, including a 3" tough stain tool, 4" upholstery tool, spraying crevice tool, TurboBrush, bare floor tool, and 6" stair tool. To get you started, system comes complete with 16-ounce Fiber Cleansing Formula, 16-ounce Tough Stain Precleaner, and 8-ounce Hard Floor Solution. Other features include a 1-gallon tank, 30 foot power cord, and 12" cleaning path. Model #9500.

When you need to get your home deep clean, you need the Bissell® ProHeat 2X® CleanShot® with Dual Dirt Lifter Power Brushes, heated cleaning and drying, and much more.

The ProHeat 2X CleanShot from Bissell uses push button CleanShot technology to tackle tough stains where you need it to.  It boasts a convenient, efficient Dry Aire feature.  Heated air distributed from the back and bottom of the machine gently dries your carpet while you clean.

For your convenience, the handy Flow Gauge monitors water and cleaning formula levels so you dont run out of cleaning solution unexpectedly.

The Custom Clean feature lets you choose the right amount of cleaning power.  Just adjust the setting, and the ProHeat 2X CleanShot does the rest automatically.

The built-in heater boosts the temperature of your hot tap water up to 25 degrees hotter for maximum cleaning effectiveness.  Dual DirtLifter® PowerBrushes provide two-times the cleaning power for topnotch performance.

The ProHeat 2X CleanShot also features Microban Antimicrobial product protection, which fights the growth of odor causing bacteria, mold, and mildew, keeping the machine cleaner and fresher between uses.

When you mean clean, get the Bissell ProHeat 2X CleanShot.  Two times the brushes, and two times the heat for a deep clean you can really see.
